subject: Billiards
lead_paragraph: Old-fashioned outfits and whisper-quiet settings — even in the World Snooker Championship in Sheffield, England — create a sleepy, old-world image snooker is trying to update.
snippet: Old-fashioned outfits and whisper-quiet settings — even in the World Snooker Championship in Sheffield, England — create a sleepy, old-world image snooker is trying to update.
